David Leger

Designer, Coder, Creator.


Hey, I’m David! I’m an aspiring full-stack developer and full-process designer, and I’m in my third year software engineering at the University of New Brunswick.

About Me

I have over five years of experience designing and building responsive websites both for myself, and for clients as a freelance web developer.

My Work

I also run Whitespace, a place for learning and teaching others technical skills in UI/UX design and programming, as well as soft skills in career development and creativity.

Whitespace

I’m always writing about my experiences and creating new projects. Sign up for my mailing list to stay in the loop with everything I’m doing.
